title: Fonts For Flash
content:
Hello folks,   
   
Fonts for Flash is a new site for pixel fonts for Flash developers. We are looking for some talented people to develop and sell fonts through our website. Visit us or email us for more details.   
   
Thank you,   
   
The FFF Team   
   
 [www.fontsforflash.com](http://web.archive.org/www.fontsforflash.com)
author: anonymous
